founder.title: Meet Dr. Beckmann
content: Disability Claim Advocates was founded with a singular goal, to make the disability claims process accessible, affordable, and compassionate for everyone. This mission stems from the personal experiences of our founder, Dr. Beckmann.

In his early 20s, Dr. Beckmann was diagnosed with multiple chronic illnesses that significantly impacted his ability to work. Faced with the challenge of balancing his health with his employment, Dr. Beckmann found himself navigating the complex world of medical leave policies and disability claims. The process was overwhelming and expensive, requiring him to hire a consultant to secure the benefits he was entitled to.

This experience, combined with witnessing his family's struggles with cancer and mental health issues, ignited Dr. Beckmann's passion for advocacy. He established Disability Claim Advocates to ensure others wouldn't face the same barriers alone.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and the LTD claims process

items.question: What are your consultation fees?
items.answer: Our pricing is designed to be both affordable and transparent. Unlike many consultants, we avoid high upfront fees and hourly rates, ensuring our services are accessible to all.

items.question: How long does the LTD claims process take?
items.answer: The timeline for LTD claims varies depending on factors such as the complexity of the case and the insurer's responsiveness. However, our expert guidance ensures that your claim is handled efficiently, minimizing unnecessary delays.

items.question: Do you provide legal representation?
items.answer: No. While we do not provide legal representation, we focus on equipping you with the knowledge and tools needed to navigate the system confidently and independently.

items.question: What conditions qualify for LTD benefits?
items.answer: LTD benefits typically cover chronic illnesses, severe injuries, and mental health conditions that prevent you from working. We'll evaluate your case to ensure your claim meets your policy's criteria.

items.question: Can insurance companies investigate me?
items.answer: Yes. Insurers often monitor claimants to verify the legitimacy of their claims. We provide advice on how to protect your claim from unwarranted scrutiny.

items.question: What happens if my claim is denied?
items.answer: Denial is not the end of the road. We'll work with you to identify the reasons for the refusal and develop a strong appeal.

items.question: Do you assist with SSDI claims?
items.answer: Yes. In addition to LTD claims, we provide guidance on SSDI applications, mainly when pursued in tandem with LTD benefits.

items.question: How do I book a consultation?
items.answer: Contact us via phone, email, or our online portal to schedule a personalized consultation. Our team will be happy to assist you.
